name: MIS Draft CRL02861 Prisoner Payroll Report v2.1
description:
Report displays Prisoners and their Payroll between the dates specified at run time.
FIN00 - v00.00.01

dataset.name: Payroll Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION IN ('Offender Payroll', 'Payroll') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('17-01-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('08-02-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, DAY_DATE, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, IEP_BAND, IEP_DATE_TIME AS V_IEP_HISTORY_CHANGE_DATE_TIME, IEP_HISTORY.IEP_BAND AS V_IEP_HISTORY, 'TBD' AS V_NOMS, 'TBD' AS V_SURNAME, 'TBD' AS V_FIRSTNAME, 'TBD' AS V_LOCATION, 'TBD' AS V_IEP, IEP_LEVEL_SEQ AS V_IEP_SEQ, DAY_DATE AS V_TRANSACTION_DATE, 'TBD' AS V_SUM, 'TBD' AS V_IEP_BAND_HISTORY, IEP_LEVEL_SEQ AS V_IEP_LVL_SEQ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: IEP History
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, TRUNC(AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME) AS IEP_CHANGE_DATE_ONLY, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL_SEQ, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID_NK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_ID_NK) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, IEP_CHANGE_DATE_ONLY, IEP_LEVEL, IEP_LEVEL_SEQ, IEP_DATE_TIME FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_NOMS
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) <>[Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:V_FIRSTNAME
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) <>[Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Offender Given Name 1])

field.name: $ref:V_IEP
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) <>[Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Payroll Transactions].[IEP Band])

field.name: $ref:V_SUM
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) = ([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]);"";"£"+Sum([Transaction Entry Amount]) In ([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE OFFENDER_SURNAME = 'RAMSAY')

field.name: $ref:V_IEP
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) <>[Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Payroll Transactions].[IEP Band])

field.name: $ref:V_IEP_BAND_HISTORY
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([IEP History].[IEP Band]) <>[IEP History].[IEP Band];[IEP History].[IEP Band])

field.name: $ref:V_SUM
field.legacySql: =If(Previous([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]) = ([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]);"";"£"+Sum([Transaction Entry Amount]) In ([Payroll Transactions].[NOMS Number]))
